document_data.name: Gogal
document_data.mainbody: Imam '''Gogal''' was the High Priest of the [[Mosque of Kor the Old]] in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|64}}
document_data.Personality: Gogal was a bit forgetful at times because of his age, but his mind remained sharp for important issues.
document_data.Activities: Gogal was blessed with supernatural wisdom from [[Kor]], making him one of the great wise men of Huzuz. Though he was getting on in age, none of his subordinates thought of asking him to retire because of the respect he earned from them.
document_data.Possessions: Gogal owned an ''[[robe of protection|aba of protection]]'', ''[[necklace of prayer beads]]'', and a ''[[disruption|flail of disruption]]''.
